long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

Planet Clicker is an engaging and imaginative incremental game where players are tasked with developing a planet from a barren rock into a thriving, bustling world. The game combines elements of strategy and idle gameplay, inviting players to generate resources by clicking on the planet, and then using those resources to upgrade and improve various aspects of their world. Its appeal lies in the gradual progression, the satisfaction of building, and the strategic choices involved in planetary development.

How to Play
Players start with a basic, uninhabited planet. The primary goal is to click on the planet to generate resources, which can then be used to purchase upgrades. These upgrades range from improving the resource generation rate to developing new ecosystems and civilizations. The game evolves as the player continues to enhance their planet, unlocking new features and capabilities.

Game Controls
Mouse Click: Click on the planet to generate resources.
Navigation: Use the mouse to select and purchase upgrades from the menu.
